entry.title: Wine On Tap - Replacement Bags 3 Pack (7.5 L)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Best Case Wholesale
Type:
Price: 11.99

These easy to use, pre-sterilized 7.5 L bags are compatible with the Wine-On-Tap bucket, which fits in the fridge or on the counter.
Bagged wine stays fresh for 6 months to a year no matter when you drink the wine. Foil bags block more UV and have a double oxygen barrier to keep your wine fresh.
Package includes 3 foil bags with a professional, no-drip tap that quickly snaps into place once you finish filling.

Wine On Tap - Sacs de rechange, paquet de 3 (7,5 L)

Sacs à vin 7,5 L pour ‘’Wine-On-Tap’’ (Paquet de 3)

Ces sacs en papier pré-stérilisés de 7,5 litres, faciles à utiliser, sont compatibles avec le seau ‘’Wine-On-Tap’’.

Le vin reste frais pendant 6 mois à un an, peu importe le moment où vous le buvez. Les sachets en aluminium bloquent plus d'UV et ont une double barrière d'oxygène pour garder votre vin au frais.

Le paquet comprend 3 sachets en aluminium avec un bec sans goutte qui se met rapidement en place une fois le remplissage terminé.

entry.title: iTap For Crown Cap Bottles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boel
Type: Equipment - Bottling
Price: 159.99

A revolutionary device for drinks dispensing into glass bottles. 

  • The counter pressure bottling method eliminates any contact between the beer and oxygen. As a result, your brew stays fresh and carbonated.
  • Easy & clean bottling: install the bottle, fill it, remove the bottle. No mess, no foam, no fuss.
  • Fast filling: you can fill and cap (the capping devices are not included) 50-60 bottles in 1 hour.
  • The quality/price ratio is impressive: you get a durable device with a 5-year warranty. It fits for both commercial breweries and homebrewers as well.
  • Minimal drainage losses (only 1%), no foaming.
  • Quick installation: even if you see an iTap for the first time, you can install it on your own in under 10 minutes. Easy use: CO2 filling with a button, fast filling.
  • No cartridges or disposable parts.
  • The drinks bottled with iTap stays fresh and remains its initial flavour up to 90-120 days.
  • You can bottle any foamy drinks, including beer, cider, soda, etc.

entry.title: iTap Clamp-lock for PET Bottles
entry.summary:
Vendor: Boel
Type: Equipment - Bottling
Price: 29.99

Counter pressure bottle filler is essential to selling beer to go. And the removable clamp-lock is designed for dispensing drinks into the PET bottles, for iTap devices.

Also this clamp lock is used to attach G-connector to an iTap to fill glasses from the same tap.

Because of convenient installation, you can quickly switch from a clamp-lock for PET bottles to a glass bottles one, and vice versa. Thanks to eliminating any contact with oxygen, the counter-pressure bottle filler ensures the beer, cider or soft drinks stay carbonated. As a result, the drinks will stay fresh in the bottles and ready to enjoy! 

  • Fits all iTap devices 
  • Versatility: use the same tap and switch clamp locks for different bottles
  • Allows to expand the product packaging options
  • Produced from high-quality food-grade materials
  • No disposable removable parts
  • Easy and convenient use of counter-pressure bottle filler
  • 5 years warranty service

You can maximize the bottling options just adding a clamp-lock for glass bottles to your counter-pressure bottling system.

entry.title: Hydrometer
entry.summary:
Vendor: KegLand
Type: Equipment - Brewing
Price: 7.99

Hydrometers are used to quickly measure the specify gravity or density of your beer or wine. The information correlates with the amount of sugar and thus allows you to determine how far along your fermentation is, and your alcohol content.

entry.title: Vitop Bag Filling Attachment
entry.summary:
Vendor: Best Case Wholesale
Type: Equipment - Bottling
Price: 19.99

Yes, you can remove the taps and fill them using a standard bottle filler. No problem at all. Home winemakers have been using this method for years to fill bags.

On the other hand, this convenient attachment looks much more professional in a U-Vint situation and can even be sold to your customers as a more convenient gravity option using standard syphon equipment. Snaps on the tap spout for even easier filling.

Fits standard Vitop taps.

Vitop Attachement pour sac à vin

Facilite le remplissage des sacs à vin.

entry.title: Sanitizer Dish - Monster Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Vintage Shop
Type: Cleaning & Sanitation
Price: 23.99

The Monster Cleaner is simply the best sanitizer you could think of. The Monster Cleaner allows for sanitization of all types of bottles. From PET beer, wine, and champagne bottles to Test Jars, Easy Siphons, Samplers, PET Carboys, Growlers, Gallon Jugs, and more!

Easy to assemble, it is a breeze to use and clean. It also acts as a versatile addition to the top of the Bottle Drying Tree with no adaptor required. May also be used independently on any flat surface.

Features:

  • Comes with an adapter so the PET carboys will fit and can be sanitized (any container up to 55 mm in neck diameter).
  • Will take all types of bottles (PET beer bottles, wine bottles, champagne bottles).
  • Use the versatile adapter to easily sanitize a a variety of sizes and shapes, including Test Jars, Easy Siphons, Samplers and more.
  • Will fit on top of the Bottle Drying Tree with no adapter required. Can also be used on any flat surface.
  • Size is perfect to sanitize Growlers and Gallon Jugs.
  • BPA free.
  • Made with food grade materials.

Not recommended to sanitize large glass carboys.

entry.title: Wine Poke - Wine Dispenser Bag (Pink)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Best Case Wholesale
Type:
Price: 39.99

The Wine Poke is perfect for both on-site and home winemakers! Simply fill the 4.5 L mylar bag with wine, put it inside your Wine Poke, position the nozzle, and fold down the flexible top, forming a loop with the rubber handle.

5 bags holds a whole 23 L batch!

The Wine Poke is made with durable nylon and has a nonslip rubber base to keep it steady on any surface–countertops, the fridge, at a picnic, or on a sailboat!

Can also be used to carry a wine bag from store bought boxed wine.

Wine Poke - Distributeur de vin (Rose)

Le Wine Poke est parfait pour les viticulteurs sur place et à domicile! Remplissez simplement le sac en mylar de 4,5 litres avec du vin, placez-le dans votre Wine Poke, positionnez la buse et pliez le dessus flexible en formant une boucle avec la poignée en caoutchouc.

5 sacs peuvent contenir un lot complet de 23 litres!

Le Wine Poke est fabriqué en nylon résistant et possède une base en caoutchouc antidérapante pour le maintenir stable sur tous les comptoirs de surface, le réfrigérateur, les pique-niques ou les voiliers!

Peut également être utilisé pour porter un sac de vin dans une boîte de vin achetée en magasin.

entry.title: Bottle Filler - Beer Gun
entry.summary:
Vendor: Best Case Wholesale
Type: Equipment - Kegs & Accessories
Price: 59.99

Have a keg of beer, but want to fill some bottles to take with you to the game, beach, or friend's house? The BeerGun is a great way to fill bottles from a keg. Every part that comes into contact with your beer is stainless steel. This unit features a CO2 purge, which helps to prevent oxidation during filling. Includes tubing and a brush for cleaning.

These features, coupled with a CO2 jacketing tube for bottle purging and ergonomic valve actuators, makes filling bottles faster, intuitive, more accurate, and easier than ever! Because the Bottle Filler Beer Gun doesn't require a pressurizing stopper, you can fill a bottle of any depth without buying different stem lengths or adding plastic hose extensions. 

Beer Gun

La simplicité du principe de fût est appréciée de tous mais l'oxygénation et la mousse de l'embouteillage pour le transport est un inconvénient. Le BeerGun exempte de ce problème en purgeant une bouteille avec du CO2 et en la remplissant avec un minimum de mousse ou de perte de carbonation. Le Beer Gun simplifie l'embouteillage par la pression d'une valve de purge et le tirage d'une gachette pour la bière!

entry.title: Siphon - Auto
entry.summary:
Vendor: The Vintage Shop
Type: Equipment - Brewing
Price: 14.99 - 15.99 (2 variants)

This auto siphon pump starts a siphon with a single stroke in as little as an inch of liquid, eliminating the need to suck on the end of the tubing potentially contaminating your product.

Siphon - Auto

Cette pompe à siphon automatique démarre un siphon en un seul geste dans un pouce de liquide, éliminant ainsi le besoin de sucer l'extrémité du tuyau potentiellement contaminant votre produit.
